thread.section_title: The Marmara Park Avenue - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: What a beautiful place
thread.title_full: What a beautiful place - Review of The Marmara Park Avenue, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: EttyBetty
title: What a beautiful place
text: I spent only one night there... but i wish I could live there. It was amazing. Excellent design, very fast room service and great staff. I cannot fault it. The only problem is, if you are going there to see NY you may decide not to leave your room instead because it's so nice. WELL DONE to you at the Marmara Park Hotel. I am a frequent traveller for work and i do not say this often, but this hotel really deserves praise.
